visits.text: Morning in Marrakech: Jardin Majorelle and YSL Museum

activities.text: Drive to Agafay Desert and watch sunset at Terre des Étoiles camp

days_plan.itin_title: Morocco Grand Tour: From the Blue City of Chefchaouen to Marrakech

visits.text: Relax in the Agafay desert with panoramic views of the Atlas Mountains
Visit the Hassan II Mosque on the Atlantic coast

activities.text: Optional camel ride or yoga at Terre des Étoiles

days_plan.itin_title: Morocco Grand Tour: From the Blue City of Chefchaouen to Marrakech
Morocco Grand Tour: From the Blue City of Chefchaouen to Marrakech

visits.text: Drive from Casablanca to Chefchaouen through scenic Rif landscapes
Explore the Medina of Chefchaouen and the Kasbah Museum
Visit the Spanish Mosque viewpoint for sunset views

activities.text: Stroll in the blue alleys of Chefchaouen
Shop local crafts and colorful textiles in the souks

days_plan.itin_title: Morocco Grand Tour: From the Blue City of Chefchaouen to Marrakech
Morocco Grand Tour: From the Blue City of Chefchaouen to Marrakech

visits.text: Drive from Chefchaouen to Fez through rolling countryside
Explore the Fez Medina, Bou Inania Madrasa, and Chaouwara Tanneries
Visit the Royal Palace gates and Jewish Quarter (Mellah)
Day trip to the Roman ruins of Volubilis
Optional stop at Moulay Idriss Zerhoun pilgrimage town

activities.text: Relax at a traditional riad in Fez Medina
Wander through the souks and try local pastries
Walk among Roman mosaics and ancient columns

days_plan.itin_title: Morocco Grand Tour: From the Blue City of Chefchaouen to Marrakech

Morocco Grand Tour: From the Blue City of Chefchaouen to Marrakech

visits.text: Drive from Fez to Rabat and visit Hassan Tower, Mausoleum of Mohammed V, and Kasbah of the Udayas
Visit Marrakech Medina, Jemaa el-Fnaa, and Koutoubia Mosque
Explore the Bahia Palace and Saadian Tombs

activities.text: Tea break at Café Maure overlooking the Bouregreg estuary
Shop in souks and enjoy rooftop dinner overlooking the Medina
